div.p: No it doesn’t affect it at all I mean it puts a better perspective towards my life but it’s not, it doesn’t affect it, I mean it affects it in a good way
it could be stressful sometimes but I sort of because I’ve been dealing with stress all my life you know I’ve been here 10 years
and so I’ve overcome that like I know how to deal with things... It affects it, it affects it because of finance you know
you’ve got a good job, you earn more money, I mean you earn a good money to have a social life, to pay your rent, to pay your bills
so that’s the main effect it has you know so it has an effect that it makes me happy what I do, you know, it’s something I wanted to do
but it doesn’t have a bad effect on my social life where I don’t seem to mix like work and sort of you know when it’s work it’s work
when it’s time for something it’s time for something else and to have a good time with a friend...
